feed.title: Track Awesome Influxdb Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome projects, libraries, tools, etc. related to InfluxDB

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 08 - Nov 14, 2021
entry.content:
Queries / Hooks

  • Time Series Admin (⭐141) - Administration panel and querying interface for InfluxDB databases
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Nov 08 - Nov 14, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 16 - Nov 22, 2020
entry.content:
Unofficial

  • InfluxDB-Client-for-Arduino (⭐402) - Arduino client for InfluxDB
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Nov 16 - Nov 22, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Feb 03 - Feb 09, 2020
entry.content:
Projects / Dedicated

  • node-opcua-logger (⭐183) - Collect industrial data from OPC UA Servers

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • logagent (⭐391) - is a modern, open-source, light-weight log shipper. Logagent includes influxdb input plugin and influxdb output plugin and many other integrations

Plugins / Hooks

  • logagent influx input plugin - Logagent plugin to receive data via Influx Line Protocol
  • logagent InfluxDB output plugin - Plugin to send data via Influx Line Protocol

Miscellaneous / Hooks

  • cleanflux (⭐32) - proxy around /query endpoint with auto retention policy selection and on the wire bug corrections
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Feb 03 - Feb 09, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 18 - Nov 24, 2019
entry.content:
Import tools / Hooks

  • JMeter2InfluxDB (⭐10) - Read JMeter results in a csv file and put results in InfluxDB after the load test

Dashboards and visualization / Hooks

  • DBeaver - DBeaver Universal Database Tool, DBeaver Enterprise has special extensions for InfluxDB
  • InfluxDB Studio (⭐912) - InfluxDB Studio is a UI management tool, its inspiration comes from other similar SQL database management tools (use InfluxData.Net run on MS Windows)
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Nov 18 - Nov 24, 2019

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Apr 29 - May 05, 2019
entry.content:
Projects / Non-dedicated

  • Sematext Agent (⭐13) - Open source monitoring agent to collect metrics from Solr, Elasticsearch, Cassandra, JVM, JMX, ClickHouse, MySQL, Hadoop, and more via pluggable integrations. Output via Influx Line Protocol to InfluxDB or Sematext Cloud
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Apr 29 - May 05, 2019

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Apr 01 - Apr 07, 2019
entry.content:
Official

  • Go (⭐191) - Go client for InfluxDB 1.x

Projects / Dedicated

  • traffic_stats - Acquires and stores statistics about CDNs controlled by Apache Traffic Control

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • heapster (⭐2.6k) - Monitor container resource usage of a Kubernetes cluster

Plugins / Hooks

  • snap-plugin-publisher-influxdb (⭐8) - Publishes snap (⭐1.8k) metrics to InfluxDB

Import tools / Hooks

  • LoadRunner Raw Results Exporter - To export scenario results (load test results) to InfluxDB
  • nmon2influxdb (⭐80) - Import nmon file into InfluxDB
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Apr 01 - Apr 07, 2019

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Aug 20 - Aug 26, 2018
entry.content:
Projects / Non-dedicated

  • ioBroker - Homeautomation / IoT Platform uses Influxdb to store history data (⭐37)

Hosting of InfluxDB / SaaS / Hooks

  • InfluxCloud - From the creators of InfluxDB
  • Aiven - Provides a choice of host (AWS, Google, DigitalOcean, etc.), geographic location, and server specs
  • Scalingo - Provides a choice of server specs
  • HostedMetrics - Geared towards custom application monitoring by hosting the combination of InfluxDB, Grafana, and StatsD
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Aug 20 - Aug 26, 2018

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Aug 06 - Aug 12, 2018
entry.content:
Projects / Non-dedicated

  • Centreon (⭐131) - A network, system, applicative supervision and monitoring tool
  • OpenHAB - A universal integration platform for all things around home automation

Plugins / Hooks

  • metrics-influxdb (⭐271) - A reporter for dropwizard metrics which announces measurements to an InfluxDB server
  • sidekiq-influxdb (⭐18) - A Sidekiq middleware to send job execution metrics to InfluxDB
entry.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Aug 06 - Aug 12, 2018

entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Apr 16 - Apr 22, 2018
entry.content:
Projects / Dedicated

  • pysysinfo_influxdb - Periodically send system information into influxdb (uses python3 + psutil, so it also works under Windows)

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • Apache JMeter - Popular load testing tool, you can get real-time results sent to a backend through the InfluxDBBackendListenerClient which allows you to send metrics (active threads, response time ...) to an InfluxDB Backend using UDP or HTTP protocols
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Apr 16 - Apr 22, 2018

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Mar 26 - Apr 01, 2018
entry.content:
Unofficial

  • influxdb-cpp-rest (⭐45) - A C++ InfluxDB client with a batching async interface

Projects / Dedicated

  • accelerometer2influx (⭐18) - Android application that takes the x-y-z axis metrics from your phone accelerometer and sends the data to InfluxDB.
  • proc_to_influxdb (⭐1) - Console app to observe Windows process starts and stops via InfluxDB
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Mar 26 - Apr 01, 2018

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Sep 11 - Sep 17, 2017
entry.content:
Projects / Dedicated

  • aggregateD (⭐14) - A dogstatsD inspired metrics and event aggregation daemon for InfluxDB

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • Domoticz - Open source Home Automation System

Libraries / Non-dedicated

  • pyVsphereInflux (⭐3) - A library and supporting script for pulling data from vSphere and inserting it into InfluxDB

Plugins / Hooks

  • fluent-plugin-influxdb (⭐111) - A buffered output plugin for fluentd and InfluxDB

Miscellaneous / Hooks

  • influx-protector (⭐12) - proxy to prevent dangerous queries getting to influxdb

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 28 - Dec 04, 2016
entry.content:
Reference material

  • Official documentation

Official

  • C# (⭐200) - A .NET library for efficiently sending points to InfluxDB
  • Rails (⭐0) - Ruby on Rails bindings to automatically write metrics into InfluxDB

Projects / Dedicated

  • Influxdb-Powershell (⭐9) - Powershell script to send Windows Performance counters to an InfluxDB Server
  • vsphere-influxdb-go (⭐215) - Collect VMware vSphere, vCenter and ESXi performance metrics and send them to InfluxDB

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • logary (⭐527) - High performance, multi-target logging, metric and health-check library for mono and .Net

Libraries / Non-dedicated

  • lua-resty-influx (⭐28) - OpenResty client for InfluxDB

Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

  • rossmcdonald/influxdb (⭐44) - Ansible role for installing, configuring, and maintaining InfluxDB
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Nov 28 - Dec 04, 2016

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Jan 04 - Jan 10, 2016
entry.content:
Official

  • Java (⭐1.2k) - Java client for InfluxDB
  • PHP (⭐429) - PHP client for InfluxDB
  • Python (⭐1.7k) - Python client for InfluxDB
  • Ruby (⭐368) - Ruby client for InfluxDB

Unofficial

  • influent (⭐38) - InfluxDB Javascript driver

Projects / Dedicated

  • influxdb-sqlserver (⭐72) - Collect Microsoft SQL Server metrics for reporting to InfluxDB and visualize them with Grafana
  • Telegraf (⭐16k) - (Official) plugin-driven server agent for reporting metrics into InfluxDB

Dashboards and visualization / Hooks

  • FluxDash (⭐36) - Terminal based InfluxDB dashboard

Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

  • chef-influxdb (⭐53) - Chef cookbook for InfluxDB
  • influxdb-formula (⭐9) - Installs and configures the InfluxDB timeseries database
entry.summary: 10 awesome projects updated on Jan 04 - Jan 10, 2016

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Nov 23 - Nov 29, 2015
entry.content:
Unofficial

  • cl-influxdb (⭐24) - Common Lisp interface to the Time Series Database InfluxDB
  • erflux (⭐29) - InfluxDB client for Erlang
  • influent.rs (⭐43) - InfluxDB Rust driver
  • InfluxDB-Client-LabVIEW (⭐23) - LabVIEW client for InfluxDB
  • instream (⭐227) - InfluxDB driver for Elixir
  • node-influx-udp (⭐18) - Write to InfluxDB using its UDP interface
  • scala-influxdb-client (⭐121) - Asynchronous InfluxDB client for Scala

Projects / Dedicated

  • mesos-influxdb-collector (⭐16) - Lightweight mesos stats collector for InfluxDB
  • mqforward (⭐78) - MQTT to influxdb forwarder
  • ntp_checker (⭐4) - compares internal NTP sources and warns if the offset between servers exceeds a definable (fraction of) seconds

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • cloudwatch-sender (⭐53) - Send metrics to InfluxDB/Graphite from Amazon Cloudwatch
  • internet_data_usage (⭐2) - Python based application to pull data plan usage for different carriers such as Telus and Koodo
  • jmxtrans (⭐1.7k) - Effectively the missing connector between speaking to a JVM via JMX on one end and whatever logging / monitoring / graphing package that you can dream up on the other end.

Libraries / Non-dedicated

  • crow-metrics - small metrics collector for node servers

Libraries / Hooks

  • go-metrics-influxdb (⭐69) - A reporter for the go-metrics library (⭐3.5k) which will post the metrics to InfluxDB
  • logrus_influxdb (⭐26) - InfluxDB Hook for Logrus (⭐25k)

Plugins / Hooks

  • embulk-output-influxdb (⭐2) - InfluxDB output plugin for Embulk (⭐1.8k)
  • exometer_influxdb (⭐36) - Exometer (⭐527) reporter for InfluxDB
  • influx-nagios-plugin (⭐29) - Nagios plugin for querying monitoring stats from InfluxDB
  • kafka-influxdb (⭐217) - A Kafka consumer for InfluxDB written in Python
  • logstash-output-influxdb (⭐58) - Community-maintained Logstash plugin to output metrics to InfluxDB
  • mod-influxdb (⭐13) - Shinken module for exporting data to InfluxDB
  • statsd-influxdb-backend (⭐171) - A naive InfluxDB backend for StatsD

Other tools / Hooks

  • influx-alert (⭐35) - A tool to query InfluxDB and send alerts based on a YAML config

Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

  • influxdb-release (⭐1) - Experimental BOSH release for InfluxDB

Queries / Hooks

  • influxer (⭐117) - InfluxDB ActiveRecord-style
entry.summary: 26 awesome projects updated on Nov 23 - Nov 29, 2015

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Aug 17 - Aug 23, 2015
entry.content:
Projects / Dedicated

  • Charmander (⭐67) - Charmander is a lab environment for measuring and analyzing resource-scheduling algorithms
  • sysinfo_influxdb - Collect and send system (linux) info to InfluxDB

Libraries / Non-dedicated

  • metrics (⭐319) - (PHP) Simple library that abstracts different metrics collectors. "I find this necessary to have a consistent and simple metrics (functional) API that doesn't cause vendor lock-in"
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Aug 17 - Aug 23, 2015

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Aug 10 - Aug 16, 2015
entry.content:
Projects / Dedicated

  • Influx-Capacitor (⭐45) - Influx-Capacitor collects metrics from windows machines using Performance Counters. Data is sent to influxDB to be viewable by grafana

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • Glances (⭐29k) - Glances an Eye on your system
  • metrics.sh (⭐143) - Collect and forward metrics using portable shell scripts

Awesome lists that include links to InfluxDB / Hooks

  • awesome-data-engineering (⭐7.5k)
entry.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Aug 10 - Aug 16, 2015

entry.title: Awesome Influxdb Updates on Jul 27 - Aug 02, 2015
entry.content:
Unofficial

  • capacitor (⭐63) - A Clojure client for InfluxDB
  • influxdb-haskell (⭐54) - Haskell client library for InfluxDB
  • InfluxDB.NET (⭐164) - .NET client for InfluxDB
  • InfluxDB PHP SDK (⭐84) - UDP/IP or HTTP adapters for read and write data
  • influxdbr (⭐93) - R library for InfluxDB
  • node-influx (⭐863) - InfluxDB Node.js Client

Projects / Dedicated

  • agento (⭐28) - Client/server collecting near realtime metrics from Linux hosts

Projects / Non-dedicated

  • cAdvisor (⭐18k) - Analyzes resource usage and performance characteristics of running containers
  • gatling (⭐6.7k) - Async Scala-Akka-Netty based Stress Tool
  • Graphios (⭐289) - A program to send nagios perf data to graphite (carbon) / statsd / librato / influxDB
  • heka (⭐3.4k) - General purpose data collection and processing tool
  • statsd-jvm-profiler (⭐331) - Simple JVM Profiler Using StatsD

Libraries / Non-dedicated

  • telemetry (⭐77) - metric reporting for Go applications

Dashboards and visualization / Hooks

  • facette (⭐1.2k) - Time series data visualization and graphing software
  • grafana (⭐69k) - Gorgeous metric viz, dashboards & editors for Graphite, InfluxDB & OpenTSDB
  • ostent (⭐180) - collects and displays system metrics and optionally relays to Graphite and/or InfluxDB

Other tools / Hooks

  • Morgoth (⭐281) - Metric anomaly detection

Provisioning InfluxDB / Hooks

  • tutum-docker-influxdb (⭐222) - Docker image to run an out-of-the-box InfluxDB server

Queries / Hooks

  • dbal-influxdb (⭐8) - Doctrine DBAL for InfluxDB
  • Influxdb::Arel (⭐11) - Influxdb::Arel is a SQL AST manager for InfluxDB dialect. It simplifies the generation of complex SQL queries

Awesome lists that include links to InfluxDB / Hooks

  • awesome-bigdata (⭐14k)
  • awesome-dashboard (⭐1.1k)
  • awesome-db (⭐1.3k)
  • awesome-go (⭐147k)
  • awesome-sysadmin (⭐24k)

Lists of awesome lists that include awesome-influxdb / Hooks

  • awesome (⭐381k)
  • lists (⭐10k)
entry.summary: 27 awesome projects updated on Jul 27 - Aug 02, 2015
